import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux';
import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup';

// app
import styles from './LossAction.styles';
import { LossActionView } from './LossAction.view';
import { selectLossActions, selectLossActionsFilterValues } from 'stores';
import { MultiSelect, FormDate } from 'components';
import { useFlexiColumns } from 'hooks';
import * as utils from 'utils';

// mui
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core';

export default function LossAction() {
  const classes = makeStyles(styles, { name: 'LossAction' })();
  const [searchTerm] = useState('');

      visible: true,
      ellipsis: true,
    },

    {
      id: 'description',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.processing.tasksGridColumns.description'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    {
      id: 'team',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.columns.claimsManagement.team'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    {
      id: 'assignedTo',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.columns.claimsManagement.assignedTo'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    {
      id: 'createdDate',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.columns.claimsManagement.createdDate'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    {
      id: 'targetDate',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.columns.claimsList.targetDueDate'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    {
      id: 'priority',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.columns.claimsManagement.priority'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    {
      id: 'status',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.columns.claimsManagement.status'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    {
      id: 'insured',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.columns.claimsManagement.insured'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    {
      id: 'division',
      label: utils.string.t('claims.columns.claimsManagement.division'),
      nowrap: true,
      visible: true,
    },
    { id: 'actions', menu: true, visible: true, mandatory: true },
  ];

  const { columns: columnsArray, columnProps, toggleColumn } = useFlexiColumns(columns);

  return (
    <LossActionView
      items={lossActionsItems}
      lossActions={lossActions}
      sort={{
        ...lossActions.sort,
      }}
      columnsArray={columnsArray}
      columnProps={columnProps}
      viewFields={viewFields}
      tableFilterFields={tableFilterFields}
      control={control}
      searchTerm={searchTerm}
      handlers={{
        search: handleSearch,
        searchFilter: handleSearchFilter,
        resetFilter: handleResetFilter,
        sort: handleSort,
        changePage: handleChangePage,
        changeRowsPerPage: handleChangeRowsPerPage,
        toggleColumn,
        resetSearch: handleResetSearch,
        onSelectSearchBy,
      }}
    />
  );
}
